definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. (acc. to Thes al.) [[חָקוּן]] Is 26:16, but v. infr.; Impf. 3 ms. [[וְאֶבֶן יׇחוּק נְחוּשָׁה]] Job 28:2 (rd. perh. [[יׇחוּקוּ]], v. Bu) and stone (ore, men) melt it into copper; [[חוּר יׇחוּק עִמָּדִי פַּלְגֵי־שָָׁמֶן]] Job 29:6 the rock used to pour out beside me streams of oil.—Is 26:16 (as above) must mean they poured out (uttered) a whisper ([[לַחַשׁ]]; i. e. prayer); but form most improb.; Koppe Gr Di Du al. prop. [[חְקוֹן לַחַשׁ]] (from assumed [[חָקוֹן]], I. [[חוק]]) = constraint of (like that of) magic; < Houb Kit [[חָֽעֲקוּ בְלַחַץ]] ´[[וגו]], or Che:Hpt [[חָעַקְנוּ מִלַּחַץ כִּי מוּסָֽרְ ְלָנוּ]].
